author: a2937
message: refactor(tools): migrate challenge editor to new curriculum structure (#61968)

files.patch:
@@ -1,21 +1,32 @@
 import { join } from 'path';
 
-export const CHALLENGE_DIR = join(
+export const SUPERBLOCK_META_DIR = join(
   process.cwd(),
   '..',
   '..',
   '..',
   'curriculum',
-  'challenges',
-  'english'
+  'structure',
+  'superblocks'
+);
+
+export const BLOCK_META_DIR = join(
+  process.cwd(),
+  '..',
+  '..',
+  '..',
+  'curriculum',
+  'structure',
+  'blocks'
 );
 
-export const META_DIR = join(
+export const CHALLENGE_DIR = join(
   process.cwd(),
   '..',
   '..',
   '..',
   'curriculum',
   'challenges',
-  '_meta'
+  'english',
+  'blocks'
 );

Navigate to
freeCodeCamp/curriculum/challenges/english - {`/${params.superblock}/${params.block}/`} + {`/${params.block}/`}
in your terminal and run the following commands:
